fluff: Rune-tattooed adepts, bespectacled magi, and flame-conjuring witches who dare to manipulate the fell forces of magic.
title: Apprentice (L), Shaman (N), Adept (C)

specialTalents.name: Languages.
specialTalents.description: You know two additional common languages and two rare languages.

talents.talent: +2 to Intelligence score or +1 to wizard spellcasting checks
Gain advantage on casting one spell you know
Learn one additional wizard spell of any tier you know
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

reward.name: Magic Conduits.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Archmage, Wizard Lord/Lady or Soulflayer, a wizard may establish or build a Great Tower (for archmage), Great Library (for lord/lady) or Chaos Citadel (for soulflayer). When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve the wizard. These followers are completely devoted to the wizard, never checking morale.

description.name: Spellcasting.
description.description: You can cast wizard spells you know. You know three tier 1 spells of your choice from the wizard spell list. Each time you gain a level, you choose new wizard spells to learn according to the Spells Known table.

spellTalents.name: Learning Spells.
spellTalents.description: You can permanently learn a wizard spell from a spell scroll by studying it for a day and succeeding on a DC 15 Intelligence check. Whether you succeed or fail, you expend the spell scroll. Spells you learn in this way don't count toward your known spells.
